feed.title: Track Awesome Python Data Science Updates Daily
feed.subtitle: Probably the best curated list of data science software in Python.

entry.title: Awesome Python Data Science Updates on Oct 04, 2024
entry.content:
Data Validation / Synthetic Data

  • DataComPy (⭐579)- A library to compare Pandas, Polars, and Spark data frames. It provides stats and lets users adjust for match accuracy.

entry.title: Awesome Python Data Science Updates on Aug 29, 2024
entry.content:
Time Series / Others

  • skforecast (⭐1.3k) - Time series forecasting with machine learning models

entry.title: Awesome Python Data Science Updates on May 10, 2024
entry.content:
Genetic Programming / Others

  • PyGAD (⭐2.1k) - Genetic Algorithm in Python.

entry.title: Awesome Python Data Science Updates on May 06, 2024
entry.content:
Optimization / Others

  • pymoo (⭐2.6k) - Multi-objective Optimization in Python.
  • pycma (⭐1.2k) - Python implementation of CMA-ES.

entry.title: Awesome Python Data Science Updates on Oct 30, 2023
entry.content:
Time Series / Others

  • sktime (⭐9.1k) - A unified framework for machine learning with time series.
  • darts (⭐8.7k) - A python library for easy manipulation and forecasting of time series.
  • statsforecast (⭐4.4k) - Lightning fast forecasting with statistical and econometric models.
  • mlforecast (⭐1k) - Scalable machine learning-based time series forecasting.
  • neuralforecast (⭐3.6k) - Scalable machine learning-based time series forecasting.
  • tslearn (⭐3k) - Machine learning toolkit dedicated to time-series data.
  • tick (⭐513) - Module for statistical learning, with a particular emphasis on time-dependent modeling.
  • greykite (⭐1.8k) - A flexible, intuitive, and fast forecasting library next.
  • Prophet (⭐19k) - Automatic Forecasting Procedure.
  • PyFlux (⭐2.1k) - Open source time series library for Python.
  • bayesloop (⭐166) - Probabilistic programming framework that facilitates objective model selection for time-varying parameter models.
  • luminol (⭐1.2k) - Anomaly Detection and Correlation library.
  • dateutil - Powerful extensions to the standard datetime module
  • maya (⭐3.4k) - makes it very easy to parse a string and for changing timezones
  • Chaos Genius (⭐758) - ML powered analytics engine for outlier/anomaly detection and root cause analysis

entry.title: Awesome Python Data Science Updates on Oct 26, 2023
entry.content:
Automated Machine Learning / Others

  • auto-sklearn (⭐7.9k) - An AutoML toolkit and a drop-in replacement for a scikit-learn estimator.
  • Auto-PyTorch (⭐2.5k) - Automatic architecture search and hyperparameter optimization for PyTorch.
  • AutoKeras (⭐9.2k) - AutoML library for deep learning.
  • AutoGluon (⭐9.1k) - AutoML for Image, Text, Tabular, Time-Series, and MultiModal Data.
  • TPOT (⭐9.9k) - AutoML tool that optimizes machine learning pipelines using genetic programming.
  • MLBox (⭐1.5k) - A powerful Automated Machine Learning python library.

entry.title: Awesome Python Data Science Updates on Oct 19, 2023
entry.content:
Machine Learning / General Purpose Machine Learning

  • PyCaret (⭐9.4k) - An open-source, low-code machine learning library in Python.

Reinforcement Learning / Others

  • Tianshou (⭐8.6k) - An elegant PyTorch deep reinforcement learning library.
  • DI-engine (⭐3.5k) - OpenDILab Decision AI Engine.
  • Imitation (⭐1.5k) - Clean PyTorch implementations of imitation and reward learning algorithms.

entry.title: Awesome Python Data Science Updates on Oct 11, 2023
entry.content:
Computer Vision / Others

  • LAVIS (⭐11k) - A One-stop Library for Language-Vision Intelligence.

entry.title: Awesome Python Data Science Updates on Oct 09, 2023
entry.content:
Computer Vision / Others

  • PyTorch3D (⭐9.4k) - PyTorch3D is FAIR's library of reusable components for deep learning with 3D data.

entry.title: Awesome Python Data Science Updates on Oct 06, 2023
entry.content:
Reinforcement Learning / Others

  • MAgent2 (⭐298) - An engine for high performance multi-agent environments with very large numbers of agents, along with a set of reference environments.

entry.title: Awesome Python Data Science Updates on Sep 28, 2023
entry.content:
Computer Vision / Others

  • Decord (⭐2.2k) - An efficient video loader for deep learning with smart shuffling that's super easy to digest.
  • MMEngine (⭐1.3k) - OpenMMLab Foundational Library for Training Deep Learning Models.

Deployment / NLP

  • streamsync (⭐1.4k) - No-code in the front, Python in the back. An open-source framework for creating data apps.
  • Vizro (⭐3k) - A toolkit for creating modular data visualization applications.

Conversion / Synthetic Data

  • treelite (⭐777) - Universal model exchange and serialization format for decision tree forests.

entry.title: Awesome Python Data Science Updates on Sep 27, 2023
entry.content:
Learning-to-Rank & Recommender Systems / Others

  • LightFM (⭐5k) - A Python implementation of LightFM, a hybrid recommendation algorithm.
  • Spotlight - Deep recommender models using PyTorch.
  • Surprise (⭐6.6k) - A Python scikit for building and analyzing recommender systems.
  • RecBole (⭐3.8k) - A unified, comprehensive and efficient recommendation library.
  • allRank (⭐949) - allRank is a framework for training learning-to-rank neural models based on PyTorch.
  • TensorFlow Recommenders (⭐2k) - A library for building recommender system models using TensorFlow.
  • TensorFlow Ranking (⭐2.8k) - Learning to Rank in TensorFlow.

Probabilistic Graphical Models / Others

  • pomegranate (⭐3.5k) - Probabilistic and graphical models for Python.

entry.title: Awesome Python Data Science Updates on Sep 25, 2023
entry.content:
Machine Learning / Gradient Boosting

  • XGBoost (⭐27k) - Scalable, Portable, and Distributed Gradient Boosting.
  • LightGBM (⭐17k) - A fast, distributed, high-performance gradient boosting.
  • CatBoost (⭐8.5k) - An open-source gradient boosting on decision trees library.
  • ThunderGBM (⭐702) - Fast GBDTs and Random Forests on GPUs.
  • NGBoost (⭐1.8k) - Natural Gradient Boosting for Probabilistic Prediction.
  • TensorFlow Decision Forests (⭐685) - A collection of state-of-the-art algorithms for the training, serving and interpretation of Decision Forest models in Keras.

entry.title: Awesome Python Data Science Updates on Sep 24, 2023
entry.content:
Reinforcement Learning / Others

  • PettingZoo (⭐3k) - An API standard for multi-agent reinforcement learning environments, with popular reference environments and related utilities.

entry.title: Awesome Python Data Science Updates on Sep 23, 2023
entry.content:
Reinforcement Learning / Others

  • Shimmy (⭐173) - An API conversion tool for popular external reinforcement learning environments.
  • EnvPool (⭐1.2k) - C++-based high-performance parallel environment execution engine (vectorized env) for general RL environments.

entry.title: Awesome Python Data Science Updates on Sep 22, 2023
entry.content:
Deep Learning / JAX

  • JAX (⭐33k) - Composable transformations of Python+NumPy programs: differentiate, vectorize, JIT to GPU/TPU, and more.
  • FLAX (⭐6.7k) - A neural network library for JAX that is designed for flexibility.
  • Optax (⭐1.9k) - A gradient processing and optimization library for JAX.

Reinforcement Learning / Others

  • Catalyst-RL (⭐47) - PyTorch framework for RL research.
  • TF-Agents (⭐2.9k) - A library for Reinforcement Learning in TensorFlow.
  • TensorForce (⭐3.3k) - A TensorFlow library for applied reinforcement learning.
  • rlpyt (⭐2.3k) - Reinforcement Learning in PyTorch.
  • cleanrl (⭐7.4k) - High-quality single file implementation of Deep Reinforcement Learning algorithms with research-friendly features (PPO, DQN, C51, DDPG, TD3, SAC, PPG).
  • Machin (⭐415) - A reinforcement library designed for pytorch.
  • SKRL (⭐808) - Modular reinforcement learning library (on PyTorch and JAX) with support for NVIDIA Isaac Gym, Isaac Orbit and Omniverse Isaac Gym.

Graph Machine Learning / Others

  • PyTorch Geometric Signed Directed (⭐142) - A signed/directed graph neural network extension library for PyTorch Geometric.
  • dgl (⭐14k) - Python package built to ease deep learning on graph, on top of existing DL frameworks.
  • StellarGraph (⭐3k) - Machine Learning on Graphs.
  • Graph Nets (⭐5.4k) - Build Graph Nets in Tensorflow.
  • TensorFlow GNN (⭐1.5k) - A library to build Graph Neural Networks on the TensorFlow platform.
  • Auto Graph Learning (⭐1.1k) - An autoML framework & toolkit for machine learning on graphs.
  • PyTorch-BigGraph (⭐3.4k) - Generate embeddings from large-scale graph-structured data.
  • GreatX (⭐85) - A graph reliability toolbox based on PyTorch and PyTorch Geometric (PyG).
  • Jraph (⭐1.4k) - A Graph Neural Network Library in Jax.

entry.title: Awesome Python Data Science Updates on Sep 21, 2023
entry.content:
Machine Learning / General Purpose Machine Learning

  • Shogun (⭐3k) - Machine learning toolbox.

Deep Learning / Others

  • transformers (⭐147k) - State-of-the-art Machine Learning for Pytorch, TensorFlow, and JAX.
  • nnabla (⭐2.8k) - Neural Network Libraries by Sony.

Natural Language Processing / Others

  • torchtext (⭐3.5k) - Data loaders and abstractions for text and NLP.
  • KerasNLP (⭐913) - Modular Natural Language Processing workflows with Keras.
  • spaCy - Industrial-Strength Natural Language Processing.
  • NLTK (⭐14k) - Modules, data sets, and tutorials supporting research and development in Natural Language Processing.
  • CLTK (⭐857) - The Classical Language Toolkik.
  • gensim - Topic Modelling for Humans.
  • pyMorfologik (⭐18) - Python binding for Morfologik.
  • skift (⭐232) - Scikit-learn wrappers for Python fastText.
  • Phonemizer (⭐1.4k) - Simple text-to-phonemes converter for multiple languages.
  • flair (⭐14k) - Very simple framework for state-of-the-art NLP.

Computer Audition / Others

  • torchaudio (⭐2.7k) - An audio library for PyTorch.
  • librosa (⭐7.7k) - Python library for audio and music analysis.
  • Yaafe (⭐245) - Audio features extraction.
  • aubio (⭐3.5k) - A library for audio and music analysis.
  • Essentia (⭐3.1k) - Library for audio and music analysis, description, and synthesis.
  • LibXtract (⭐229) - A simple, portable, lightweight library of audio feature extraction functions.
  • Marsyas (⭐414) - Music Analysis, Retrieval, and Synthesis for Audio Signals.
  • muda (⭐234) - A library for augmenting annotated audio data.
  • madmom (⭐1.5k) - Python audio and music signal processing library.

Computer Vision / Others

  • torchvision (⭐17k) - Datasets, Transforms, and Models specific to Computer Vision.
  • KerasCV (⭐1k) - Industry-strength Computer Vision workflows with Keras.
  • OpenCV (⭐83k) - Open Source Computer Vision Library.
  • scikit-image (⭐6.3k) - Image Processing SciKit (Toolbox for SciPy).
  • imgaug (⭐15k) - Image augmentation for machine learning experiments.
  • imgaug_extension - Additional augmentations for imgaug.
  • Augmentor (⭐5.1k) - Image augmentation library in Python for machine learning.
  • albumentations (⭐15k) - Fast image augmentation library and easy-to-use wrapper around other libraries.

Feature Engineering / General

  • Featuretools (⭐7.5k) - Automated feature engineering.
  • Feature Engine (⭐2.1k) - Feature engineering package with sklearn-like functionality.
  • OpenFE (⭐805) - Automated feature generation with expert-level performance.
  • skl-groups (⭐41) - A scikit-learn addon to operate on set/"group"-based features.
  • Feature Forge (⭐383) - A set of tools for creating and testing machine learning features.
  • few (⭐51) - A feature engineering wrapper for sklearn.
  • scikit-mdr (⭐125) - A sklearn-compatible Python implementation of Multifactor Dimensionality Reduction (MDR) for feature construction.
  • tsfresh (⭐8.8k) - Automatic extraction of relevant features from time series.
  • dirty_cat (⭐19) - Machine learning on dirty tabular data (especially: string-based variables for classifcation and regression).
  • NitroFE (⭐106) - Moving window features.
  • sk-transformer (⭐11) - A collection of various pandas & scikit-learn compatible transformers for all kinds of preprocessing and feature engineering steps

Feature Engineering / Feature Selection

  • scikit-feature (⭐1.5k) - Feature selection repository in Python.
  • boruta_py (⭐1.6k) - Implementations of the Boruta all-relevant feature selection method.
  • BoostARoota (⭐222) - A fast xgboost feature selection algorithm.
  • scikit-rebate (⭐418) - A scikit-learn-compatible Python implementation of ReBATE, a suite of Relief-based feature selection algorithms for Machine Learning.
  • zoofs (⭐247) - A feature selection library based on evolutionary algorithms.

Visualization / General Purposes

  • Matplotlib (⭐21k) - Plotting with Python.
  • seaborn (⭐13k) - Statistical data visualization using matplotlib.
  • prettyplotlib (⭐1.7k) - Painlessly create beautiful matplotlib plots.
  • python-ternary (⭐768) - Ternary plotting library for Python with matplotlib.
  • missingno (⭐4.1k) - Missing data visualization module for Python.
  • chartify (⭐3.6k) - Python library that makes it easy for data scientists to create charts.
  • physt (⭐135) - Improved histograms.

Visualization / Interactive plots

  • animatplot (⭐416) - A python package for animating plots built on matplotlib.
  • plotly - A Python library that makes interactive and publication-quality graphs.
  • Bokeh (⭐20k) - Interactive Web Plotting for Python.
  • Altair - Declarative statistical visualization library for Python. Can easily do many data transformation within the code to create graph
  • bqplot (⭐3.7k) - Plotting library for IPython/Jupyter notebooks
  • pyecharts (⭐15k) - Migrated from Echarts (⭐64k), a charting and visualization library, to Python's interactive visual drawing library.

Visualization / Map

  • folium - Makes it easy to visualize data on an interactive open street map
  • geemap (⭐3.7k) - Python package for interactive mapping with Google Earth Engine (GEE)

Visualization / Automatic Plotting

  • HoloViews (⭐2.8k) - Stop plotting your data - annotate your data and let it visualize itself.
  • AutoViz (⭐1.8k): Visualize data automatically with 1 line of code (ideal for machine learning)
  • SweetViz (⭐3k): Visualize and compare datasets, target values and associations, with one line of code.

Visualization / NLP

  • pyLDAvis (⭐1.8k): Visualize interactive topic model

Deployment / NLP

  • fastapi - Modern, fast (high-performance), a web framework for building APIs with Python
  • streamlit - Make it easy to deploy the machine learning model
  • gradio (⭐39k) - Create UIs for your machine learning model in Python in 3 minutes.
  • datapane - A collection of APIs to turn scripts and notebooks into interactive reports.
  • binder - Enable sharing and execute Jupyter Notebooks

Data Manipulation / Data Frames

  • pandas - Powerful Python data analysis toolkit.
  • polars (⭐34k) - A fast multi-threaded, hybrid-out-of-core DataFrame library.
  • Arctic (⭐3.1k) - High-performance datastore for time series and tick data.
  • datatable (⭐1.9k) - Data.table for Python.
  • pandas_profiling (⭐13k) - Create HTML profiling reports from pandas DataFrame objects
  • cuDF (⭐9k) - GPU DataFrame Library.
  • blaze (⭐3.2k) - NumPy and pandas interface to Big Data.
  • pandasql (⭐1.3k) - Allows you to query pandas DataFrames using SQL syntax.
  • pandas-gbq (⭐475) - pandas Google Big Query.
  • xpandas (⭐26) - Universal 1d/2d data containers with Transformers .functionality for data analysis by The Alan Turing Institute.
  • pysparkling (⭐270) - A pure Python implementation of Apache Spark's RDD and DStream interfaces.
  • modin (⭐10k) - Speed up your pandas workflows by changing a single line of code.
  • swifter (⭐2.6k) - A package that efficiently applies any function to a pandas dataframe or series in the fastest available manner.
  • pandas-log (⭐215) - A package that allows providing feedback about basic pandas operations and finds both business logic and performance issues.
  • vaex (⭐8.4k) - Out-of-Core DataFrames for Python, ML, visualize and explore big tabular data at a billion rows per second.
  • xarray (⭐3.9k) - Xarray combines the best features of NumPy and pandas for multidimensional data selection by supplementing numerical axis labels with named dimensions for more intuitive, concise, and less error-prone indexing routines.

Data Manipulation / Pipelines

  • pdpipe (⭐720) - Sasy pipelines for pandas DataFrames.
  • SSPipe - Python pipe (|) operator with support for DataFrames and Numpy, and Pytorch.
  • pandas-ply (⭐197) - Functional data manipulation for pandas.
  • Dplython (⭐763) - Dplyr for Python.
  • sklearn-pandas (⭐2.8k) - pandas integration with sklearn.
  • Dataset (⭐201) - Helps you conveniently work with random or sequential batches of your data and define data processing.
  • pyjanitor (⭐1.4k) - Clean APIs for data cleaning.
  • meza (⭐416) - A Python toolkit for processing tabular data.
  • Prodmodel (⭐58) - Build system for data science pipelines.
  • dopanda (⭐480) - Hints and tips for using pandas in an analysis environment.
  • Hamilton (⭐2.2k) - A microframework for dataframe generation that applies Directed Acyclic Graphs specified by a flow of lazily evaluated Python functions.

Data Manipulation / Data-centric AI

  • cleanlab (⭐11k) - The standard data-centric AI package for data quality and machine learning with messy, real-world data and labels.
  • snorkel (⭐5.9k) - A system for quickly generating training data with weak supervision.
  • dataprep (⭐2.2k) - Collect, clean, and visualize your data in Python with a few lines of code.

Data Manipulation / Synthetic Data

  • ydata-synthetic (⭐1.6k) - A package to generate synthetic tabular and time-series data leveraging the state-of-the-art generative models.

entry.title: Awesome Python Data Science Updates on Sep 20, 2023
entry.content:
Reinforcement Learning / Others

  • Gymnasium (⭐9.6k) - An API standard for single-agent reinforcement learning environments, with popular reference environments and related utilities (formerly Gym (⭐36k)).
  • Stable Baselines3 (⭐11k) - A set of improved implementations of reinforcement learning algorithms based on OpenAI Baselines.
  • RLlib - Scalable Reinforcement Learning.
  • Acme (⭐3.7k) - A library of reinforcement learning components and agents.
  • d3rlpy (⭐1.5k) - An offline deep reinforcement learning library.
  • TRFL (⭐3.1k) - TensorFlow Reinforcement Learning.
  • Dopamine (⭐11k) - A research framework for fast prototyping of reinforcement learning algorithms.
  • keras-rl (⭐5.6k) - Deep Reinforcement Learning for Keras.
  • garage (⭐2k) - A toolkit for reproducible reinforcement learning research.
  • Horizon (⭐3.6k) - A platform for Applied Reinforcement Learning.

Graph Machine Learning / Others

  • pytorch_geometric (⭐23k) - Geometric Deep Learning Extension Library for PyTorch.
  • pytorch_geometric_temporal (⭐2.8k) - Temporal Extension Library for PyTorch Geometric.
  • Spektral (⭐2.4k) - Deep learning on graphs.
  • Karate Club (⭐2.2k) - An unsupervised machine learning library for graph-structured data.
  • Little Ball of Fur (⭐710) - A library for sampling graph structured data.

Probabilistic Graphical Models / Others

  • pgmpy (⭐3k) - A python library for working with Probabilistic Graphical Models.
  • pyAgrum - A GRaphical Universal Modeler.

Probabilistic Methods / Others

  • pyro (⭐8.8k) - A flexible, scalable deep probabilistic programming library built on PyTorch.
  • PyMC (⭐9.1k) - Bayesian Stochastic Modelling in Python.
  • ZhuSuan - Bayesian Deep Learning.
  • GPflow - Gaussian processes in TensorFlow.
  • InferPy (⭐148) - Deep Probabilistic Modelling Made Easy.
  • PyStan (⭐354) - Bayesian inference using the No-U-Turn sampler (Python interface).
  • sklearn-bayes (⭐519) - Python package for Bayesian Machine Learning with scikit-learn API.
  • skpro (⭐271) - Supervised domain-agnostic prediction framework for probabilistic modelling by The Alan Turing Institute.
  • PyVarInf (⭐359) - Bayesian Deep Learning methods with Variational Inference for PyTorch.
  • emcee (⭐1.5k) - The Python ensemble sampling toolkit for affine-invariant MCMC.
  • hsmmlearn (⭐85) - A library for hidden semi-Markov models with explicit durations.
  • pyhsmm (⭐560) - Bayesian inference in HSMMs and HMMs.
  • GPyTorch (⭐3.7k) - A highly efficient and modular implementation of Gaussian Processes in PyTorch.
  • sklearn-crfsuite (⭐431) - A scikit-learn-inspired API for CRFsuite.

Web Scraping / Synthetic Data

  • BeautifulSoup: The easiest library to scrape static websites for beginners
  • Scrapy: Fast and extensible scraping library. Can write rules and create customized scraper without touching the core
  • Selenium: Use Selenium Python API to access all functionalities of Selenium WebDriver in an intuitive way like a real user.
  • Pattern (⭐8.8k): High level scraping for well-establish websites such as Google, Twitter, and Wikipedia. Also has NLP, machine learning algorithms, and visualization
  • twitterscraper (⭐2.5k): Efficient library to scrape Twitter

entry.title: Awesome Python Data Science Updates on Apr 27, 2023
entry.content:
Quantum Computing / Synthetic Data

  • qiskit (⭐6.3k) - Qiskit is an open-source SDK for working with quantum computers at the level of circuits, algorithms, and application modules.

entry.title: Awesome Python Data Science Updates on Feb 22, 2023
entry.content:
Optimization / Others

  • Optuna (⭐12k) - A hyperparameter optimization framework.

entry.title: Awesome Python Data Science Updates on Jan 29, 2023
entry.content:
Machine Learning / General Purpose Machine Learning

  • dlib (⭐14k) - Toolkit for making real-world machine learning and data analysis applications in C++ (Python bindings).

Machine Learning / Ensemble Methods

  • Stacking (⭐224) - Simple and useful stacking library written in Python.

Machine Learning / Imbalanced Datasets

  • imbalanced-learn (⭐7k) - Module to perform under-sampling and over-sampling with various techniques.

Deep Learning / PyTorch

  • skorch (⭐6.1k) - A scikit-learn compatible neural network library that wraps PyTorch.
  • ChemicalX (⭐745) - A PyTorch-based deep learning library for drug pair scoring.

Deep Learning / TensorFlow

  • tfdeploy (⭐354) - Deploy TensorFlow graphs for fast evaluation and export to TensorFlow-less environments running numpy.
  • Ludwig (⭐12k) - A toolbox that allows one to train and test deep learning models without the need to write code.
  • Hyperas (⭐2.2k) - Keras + Hyperopt: A straightforward wrapper for a convenient hyperparameter.

Model Explanation / Others

  • dalex (⭐1.4k) - moDel Agnostic Language for Exploration and explanation.
  • Shapley (⭐220) - A data-driven framework to quantify the value of classifiers in a machine learning ensemble.
  • tensorboard-pytorch (⭐8k) - Tensorboard for PyTorch (and chainer, mxnet, numpy, ...).

Optimization / Others

  • sklearn-genetic-opt (⭐343) - Hyperparameters tuning and feature selection using evolutionary algorithms.
  • OR-Tools - An open-source software suite for optimization by Google; provides a unified programming interface to a half dozen solvers: SCIP, GLPK, GLOP, CP-SAT, CPLEX, and Gurobi.

Experimentation / Synthetic Data

  • Neptune - A lightweight ML experiment tracking, results visualization, and management tool.
  • Sacred (⭐4.3k) - A tool to help you configure, organize, log, and reproduce experiments.

Data Validation / Synthetic Data

  • pandera (⭐3.9k) - A lightweight, flexible, and expressive statistical data testing library.

Evaluation / Synthetic Data

  • sklearn-evaluation (⭐3) - Model evaluation made easy: plots, tables, and markdown reports.
  • AI Fairness 360 (⭐2.6k) - Fairness metrics for datasets and ML models, explanations, and algorithms to mitigate bias in datasets and models.

Quantum Computing / Synthetic Data

  • cirq (⭐4.6k) - A python framework for creating, editing, and invoking Noisy Intermediate Scale Quantum (NISQ) circuits.

Conversion / Synthetic Data

  • sklearn-porter (⭐1.3k) - Transpile trained scikit-learn estimators to C, Java, JavaScript, and others.

entry.title: Awesome Python Data Science Updates on Dec 22, 2022
entry.content:
Data Validation / Synthetic Data

  • great_expectations (⭐11k) - Always know what to expect from your data.
  • deepchecks (⭐3.8k) - Validation & testing of ML models and data during model development, deployment, and production.
  • evidently (⭐6.4k) - Evaluate and monitor ML models from validation to production.
  • TensorFlow Data Validation (⭐772) - Library for exploring and validating machine learning data.

entry.title: Awesome Python Data Science Updates on Dec 17, 2022
entry.content:
Deep Learning / PyTorch

  • pytorch-lightning (⭐30k) - PyTorch Lightning is just organized PyTorch.

Experimentation / Synthetic Data

  • mlflow (⭐21k) - Open source platform for the machine learning lifecycle.
  • dvc (⭐15k) - Data Version Control | Git for Data & Models | ML Experiments Management.
  • Ax (⭐2.5k) - Adaptive Experimentation Platform.

Computations / Synthetic Data

  • NumExpr (⭐2.3k) - A fast numerical expression evaluator for NumPy that comes with an integrated computing virtual machine to speed calculations up by avoiding memory allocation for intermediate results.

entry.title: Awesome Python Data Science Updates on Jul 29, 2022
entry.content:
Experimentation / Synthetic Data

  • envd (⭐2.1k) - 🏕️ machine learning development environment for data science and AI/ML engineering teams.

entry.title: Awesome Python Data Science Updates on Jan 12, 2022
entry.content:
Machine Learning / General Purpose Machine Learning

  • sklearn-expertsys (⭐490) - Highly interpretable classifiers for scikit learn.

entry.title: Awesome Python Data Science Updates on Oct 13, 2020
entry.content:
Deep Learning / TensorFlow

  • Keras - A high-level neural networks API running on top of TensorFlow.

Deep Learning / Others

  • Tangent (⭐2.3k) - Source-to-Source Debuggable Derivatives in Pure Python.
  • autograd (⭐7.3k) - Efficiently computes derivatives of numpy code.
  • Caffe (⭐34k) - A fast open framework for deep learning.

entry.title: Awesome Python Data Science Updates on Jun 17, 2020
entry.content:
Machine Learning / General Purpose Machine Learning

  • causalml (⭐5.5k) - Uplift modeling and causal inference with machine learning algorithms.

Distributed Computing / Synthetic Data

entry.title: Awesome Python Data Science Updates on Aug 31, 2019
entry.content:
Machine Learning / General Purpose Machine Learning

  • scikit-learn - Machine learning in Python.
  • cuML (⭐4.8k) - RAPIDS Machine Learning Library.
  • modAL (⭐2.3k) - Modular active learning framework for Python3.
  • Sparkit-learn (⭐1.2k) - PySpark + scikit-learn = Sparkit-learn.
  • MLxtend (⭐5k) - Extension and helper modules for Python's data analysis and machine learning libraries.
  • Reproducible Experiment Platform (REP) (⭐696) - Machine Learning toolbox for Humans.
  • scikit-multilearn (⭐939) - Multi-label classification for python.
  • seqlearn (⭐697) - Sequence classification toolkit for Python.
  • pystruct (⭐668) - Simple structured learning framework for Python.
  • RuleFit (⭐422) - Implementation of the rulefit.
  • metric-learn (⭐1.4k) - Metric learning algorithms in Python.

Machine Learning / Ensemble Methods

  • ML-Ensemble - High performance ensemble learning.
  • stacked_generalization (⭐117) - Library for machine learning stacking generalization.
  • vecstack (⭐692) - Python package for stacking (machine learning technique).

Machine Learning / Imbalanced Datasets

  • imbalanced-algorithms (⭐239) - Python-based implementations of algorithms for learning on imbalanced data.

Machine Learning / Random Forests

  • rpforest (⭐224) - A forest of random projection trees.
  • sklearn-random-bits-forest (⭐9) - Wrapper of the Random Bits Forest program written by (Wang et al., 2016).
  • rgf_python (⭐381) - Python Wrapper of Regularized Greedy Forest.

Machine Learning / Kernel Methods

  • pyFM (⭐926) - Factorization machines in python.
  • fastFM (⭐1.1k) - A library for Factorization Machines.
  • tffm (⭐781) - TensorFlow implementation of an arbitrary order Factorization Machine.
  • scikit-rvm (⭐238) - Relevance Vector Machine implementation using the scikit-learn API.
  • ThunderSVM (⭐1.6k) - A fast SVM Library on GPUs and CPUs.

Deep Learning / PyTorch

  • PyTorch (⭐91k) - Tensors and Dynamic neural networks in Python with strong GPU acceleration.
  • ignite (⭐4.7k) - High-level library to help with training neural networks in PyTorch.

Deep Learning / TensorFlow

  • TensorFlow (⭐191k) - Computation using data flow graphs for scalable machine learning by Google.
  • TensorLayer (⭐7.4k) - Deep Learning and Reinforcement Learning Library for Researcher and Engineer.
  • TFLearn (⭐9.6k) - Deep learning library featuring a higher-level API for TensorFlow.
  • Sonnet (⭐9.9k) - TensorFlow-based neural network library.
  • Polyaxon (⭐3.7k) - A platform that helps you build, manage and monitor deep learning models.
  • tensorflow-upstream (⭐694) - TensorFlow ROCm port.
  • TensorFlow Fold (⭐1.8k) - Deep learning with dynamic computation graphs in TensorFlow.
  • TensorLight (⭐11) - A high-level framework for TensorFlow.
  • Mesh TensorFlow (⭐1.6k) - Model Parallelism Made Easier.

Model Explanation / Others

  • Contrastive Explanation (⭐44) - Contrastive Explanation (Foil Trees).
  • yellowbrick (⭐4.4k) - Visual analysis and diagnostic tools to facilitate machine learning model selection.
  • scikit-plot (⭐2.4k) - An intuitive library to add plotting functionality to scikit-learn objects.
  • shap (⭐24k) - A unified approach to explain the output of any machine learning model.
  • Lime (⭐12k) - Explaining the predictions of any machine learning classifier.
  • FairML (⭐364) - FairML is a python toolbox auditing the machine learning models for bias.
  • model-analysis (⭐1.3k) - Model analysis tools for TensorFlow.
  • themis-ml (⭐126) - A library that implements fairness-aware machine learning algorithms.
  • treeinterpreter (⭐759) - Interpreting scikit-learn's decision tree and random forest predictions.

Genetic Programming / Others

  • gplearn (⭐1.7k) - Genetic Programming in Python.
  • karoo_gp (⭐164) - A Genetic Programming platform for Python with GPU support.
  • sklearn-genetic (⭐322) - Genetic feature selection module for scikit-learn.

Optimization / Others

  • BoTorch (⭐3.3k) - Bayesian optimization in PyTorch.
  • hyperopt-sklearn (⭐1.6k) - Hyper-parameter optimization for sklearn.
  • sklearn-deap (⭐774) - Use evolutionary algorithms instead of gridsearch in scikit-learn.
  • sigopt_sklearn (⭐75) - SigOpt wrappers for scikit-learn methods.
  • GPflowOpt (⭐272) - Bayesian Optimization using GPflow.

Statistics / NLP

  • pandas_summary (⭐519) - Extension to pandas dataframes describe function.
  • Pandas Profiling (⭐13k) - Create HTML profiling reports from pandas DataFrame objects.
  • Alphalens (⭐3.8k) - Performance analysis of predictive (alpha) stock factors.

Computations / Synthetic Data

  • Dask (⭐13k) - Parallel computing with task scheduling.

Spatial Analysis / Synthetic Data

  • GeoPandas (⭐4.8k) - Python tools for geographic data.

entry.title: Awesome Python Data Science Updates on Aug 30, 2019
entry.content:
Model Explanation / Others

  • Auralisation (⭐42) - Auralisation of learned features in CNN (for audio).
  • CapsNet-Visualization (⭐395) - A visualization of the CapsNet layers to better understand how it works.
  • lucid (⭐4.7k) - A collection of infrastructure and tools for research in neural network interpretability.
  • Netron (⭐31k) - Visualizer for deep learning and machine learning models (no Python code, but visualizes models from most Python Deep Learning frameworks).
  • FlashLight - Visualization Tool for your NeuralNetwork.

entry.title: Awesome Python Data Science Updates on Aug 27, 2019
entry.content:
Machine Learning / General Purpose Machine Learning

  • xLearn (⭐3.1k) - High Performance, Easy-to-use, and Scalable Machine Learning Package.
  • mlpack (⭐5.4k) - A scalable C++ machine learning library (Python bindings).
  • pyGAM (⭐898) - Generalized Additive Models in Python.

Machine Learning / Kernel Methods

  • liquidSVM (⭐67) - An implementation of SVMs.

Model Explanation / Others

  • Alibi (⭐2.5k) - Algorithms for monitoring and explaining machine learning models.
  • anchor (⭐804) - Code for "High-Precision Model-Agnostic Explanations" paper.
  • aequitas (⭐725) - Bias and Fairness Audit Toolkit.
  • ELI5 (⭐2.8k) - A library for debugging/inspecting machine learning classifiers and explaining their predictions.
  • L2X (⭐124) - Code for replicating the experiments in the paper Learning to Explain: An Information-Theoretic Perspective on Model Interpretation.
  • PDPbox (⭐860) - Partial dependence plot toolbox.
  • PyCEbox (⭐165) - Python Individual Conditional Expectation Plot Toolbox.
  • Skater - Python Library for Model Interpretation.
  • AI Explainability 360 (⭐1.7k) - Interpretability and explainability of data and machine learning models.

Genetic Programming / Others

  • DEAP (⭐6.1k) - Distributed Evolutionary Algorithms in Python.
  • monkeys (⭐125) - A strongly-typed genetic programming framework for Python.

Optimization / Others

  • Spearmint (⭐1.6k) - Bayesian optimization.
  • SMAC3 (⭐1.2k) - Sequential Model-based Algorithm Configuration.
  • Optunity (⭐421) - Is a library containing various optimizers for hyperparameter tuning.
  • hyperopt (⭐7.4k) - Distributed Asynchronous Hyperparameter Optimization in Python.
  • SafeOpt (⭐147) - Safe Bayesian Optimization.
  • scikit-optimize (⭐2.8k) - Sequential model-based optimization with a scipy.optimize interface.
  • Solid (⭐579) - A comprehensive gradient-free optimization framework written in Python.
  • PySwarms (⭐1.3k) - A research toolkit for particle swarm optimization in Python.
  • Platypus (⭐615) - A Free and Open Source Python Library for Multiobjective Optimization.
  • POT (⭐2.6k) - Python Optimal Transport library.
  • Talos (⭐1.6k) - Hyperparameter Optimization for Keras Models.
  • nlopt (⭐2.1k) - Library for nonlinear optimization (global and local, constrained or unconstrained).

Statistics / NLP

  • scikit-posthocs (⭐369) - Pairwise Multiple Comparisons Post-hoc Tests.

Evaluation / Synthetic Data

  • recmetrics (⭐579) - Library of useful metrics and plots for evaluating recommender systems.
  • Metrics (⭐1.6k) - Machine learning evaluation metric.

Computations / Synthetic Data

  • numpy - The fundamental package needed for scientific computing with Python.
  • bottleneck (⭐1.1k) - Fast NumPy array functions written in C.
  • CuPy (⭐10k) - NumPy-like API accelerated with CUDA.
  • scikit-tensor (⭐406) - Python library for multilinear algebra and tensor factorizations.
  • numdifftools (⭐266) - Solve automatic numerical differentiation problems in one or more variables.
  • quaternion (⭐637) - Add built-in support for quaternions to numpy.
  • adaptive (⭐1.2k) - Tools for adaptive and parallel samping of mathematical functions.

Spatial Analysis / Synthetic Data

  • PySal (⭐1.4k) - Python Spatial Analysis Library.

Quantum Computing / Synthetic Data

  • QML (⭐205) - A Python Toolkit for Quantum Machine Learning.

Conversion / Synthetic Data

  • ONNX (⭐19k) - Open Neural Network Exchange.
  • MMdnn (⭐5.8k) - A set of tools to help users inter-operate among different deep learning frameworks.
